name: Add new subscribers to a group in MailerLite from new form submissions in Swipe Pages
description:
This template periodically checks for new form submissions in Swipe Pages and uses the retrieved information to add new subscribers to a group in MailerLite.

The template expects your Swipe Pages form to collect at least the following information:
1) Email
2) First name
3) Last name

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
